# What not to do

<br>
.center[
  ![](https://media.giphy.com/media/feprkkbVzFfRjCgp3G/giphy.gif)
]


---
# Exhibit A

Student:
> This may be a stupid question, but --

Professor:
> It is.

---
# Exhibit B

Professor begins selling books on e-bay that were received (for free) from publishers. Uses department resources to package and ship books for free too.

---
# Exhibit C

Professor emails department explaining why their preferred job candidate is great and so much better than another professor in the department

---
# Exhibit D

Professor proclaims in a department meeting that a junior professor is much better than other people the department has promoted, with said promotee in meeting

---
# Exhibit E

Job candidate asked about "working papers" on their CV. Job candidate reveals them to be poorly thought-out ideas at best, with no paper to speak of.

---
# Exhibit F

Break room note...
